universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Class WidgetUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.ui.widget.WidgetUtils

  • public final class WidgetUtils
extends Object
    Set of utils used by extended widgets from this library.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Detail

      • showSoftKeyboard

        public static boolean showSoftKeyboard(@NonNull
                                       View view)
        Shows the soft keyboard on the current window for the given view.
        Parameters:
        view - The view for which to show keyboard. If the view does not have focus, it will be requested for it via View.requestFocus().
        Returns:
        True if keyboard has been shown successfully, false if the view does not have focus and it did not took it when requested.
        See Also:
        InputMethodManager.showSoftInput(View, int), InputMethodManager.SHOW_FORCED

      • hideSoftKeyboard

        public static boolean hideSoftKeyboard(@NonNull
                                       View view)
        Hides the soft keyboard from the current window using token of the given view.
        Parameters:
        view - The view for which to hide keyboard.
        Returns:
        True if keyboard has been hidden successfully, false if the view does not have focus.
        See Also:
        InputMethodManager.hideSoftInputFromWindow(IBinder, int), InputMethodManager.RESULT_UNCHANGED_SHOWN

      • resolveColorForState

        public static int resolveColorForState(@NonNull
                                       ColorStateList colorStateList,
                                       @NonNull
                                       int[] stateSet)
        Obtains a color from the specified colorStateList for the specified stateSet.
        Parameters:
        colorStateList - The colors state list from which to obtain the color.
        stateSet - The state set used to resolved the color.
        Returns:
        Resolved color for the state or the default one if the colors state list does not hold color for the specified state.

      • createMotionCancelingEvent

        @NonNull
public static MotionEvent createMotionCancelingEvent(@NonNull
                                                               MotionEvent source)
        Creates a motion event with MotionEvent.ACTION_CANCEL action with data copied from the given source event.

        Do not forget to recycle the acquired event via MotionEvent.recycle() when you are done with it.

        Parameters:
        source - The desired motion event from which to copy data for the new event.
        Returns:
        Motion event that may be used to cancel current motion session.
        See Also:
        MotionEvent.obtain(MotionEvent)
